H

handleAddRoomFailed(String, int, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when an attempt to add a room to the server fails.
handleClientJoinedRoom(String, String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when a client joins a room.
handleClientLeftRoom(String, String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when a client leaves a room.
handleCommand(String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Respond to the given command from another client.
handleJoinRoomFailed(String, String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when an attempt by the client with this event handler to join a room fails.
handleOtherClientDisconnected(String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when another client disconnects from the server.
handleOtherClientJoined(String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when another client joins the server.
handleRoomAdded(RoomInfo, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when a room is added to the server
handleRoomClosed(String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when a room is closed (blocking clients from joining).
handleRoomOpened(String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when a room is opened (allowing clients to join) You should close a room before starting a game so players cannot join after the game started.
handleRoomOwnership(String, String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when the ownership of a room changes.
handleRoomRemoved(String, GameClient) - Method in interface mp_client_base.ClientEventHandler
Called when a room is removed from the server
